import React, { useState } from 'react' export default function Textarea() { /*button*/ const Clickonclick= () =>{ let newText = text.toUpperCase(); setText(newText) } /*textarea*/ const Changeonchange = (event) =>{ setText(event.target.value) } //states const [text,setText]=useState('TYPE'); return ( <>





TEXT SUMMARY:

{text.split(" ").length} words
{text.length} characters
) }
